text: Ur issefk ara i imezda$ n Lmadina, d wayen i sen d izzin n waâôaben n ucluê, ad gwrin deffir Umazan n Öebbi, ne$ ad smenyafen iman nnsen i iman is. Ayagi, acku ur ten ipêaz fad, ne$ âaggu, ne$ llaé, deg ubrid n Öebbi. Ur keçmen akal ara isserfun ijehliyen, ur ppaîîafen acemma s$uô ucengu, siwa ma dayen i sen iuran d igi n wayen ilhan. Öebbi, s tidep, ur Isôuêu arraz iâaôviyen
